div.div: Adaptation levels of irrigation and crop variety for each decade from the 2010s to 2090 s (adaptation pathways) in three cases (timely, prioritize irrigation, and prioritize variety cases) under the MIROC-ESM projection.
div.p: The countries shown are China (CHN), the United States (USA), and Germany (GER). The numerals within graphs indicate decades in the 21st century when the adaptation set is implemented (e.g., “10 s” represents the 2010 s). ( a), Under the RCP8.5 scenario. ( b), Under the RCP2.6 scenario.
